thread.section_title: BIGWORDS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIGWORDS.com | bigwords.com
thread.title: SunshineGrl

author: SunshineGrl
title: SunshineGrl
text: I've been using BigWords for at least 10 years (undergrad, grad school, and medical school) and have saved thousands of dollars! They consistently show me the least expensive way to buy books and I have never had a single issue. I love that they also will take into account any coupons that might be available, so that you can maximize your savings. Top notch company that I recommend to anyone and everyone!
